On the discord servers of Supabase, drizzle, bun, etc. there is a channel, #showcase for showing your projects.

What if we have a site for exploring all those projects, their advancements (kind of GitHub feed & build in public) and finding contributors?

cc @_buildspace @FarzaTV https://t.co/CSEfAWgRAr
